alert.note: Alert for Stevens (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:55PM CST until January 08 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Stevens County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
